channel.title: CVE Feed for Debian GNU/Linux -- apt as used in Debian Stretch and Ubuntu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Debian GNU/Linux -- apt as used in Debian Stretch and Ubuntu

item.title: CVE-2019-3462|2024-09-16T16:32:28.586Z -- debian%20gnu%2Flinux -- apt%20as%20used%20in%20debian%20stretch%20and%20ubuntu
item.description: Incorrect sanitation of the 302 redirect field in HTTP transport method of apt versions 1.4.8 and earlier can lead to content injection by a MITM attacker, potentially leading to remote code execution on the target machine.
